commentAnnotations.text: If any signs of intraocular inflammation are present, then an IVT injection must not be performed.
PRP performed as a day case hospitalization should not be recorded as a serious adverse event (SAE) despite hospitalization.
It is recommended to receive the COVID-19 vaccine at least 7 days before or after the study treatment visit.
Two consecutive injections should be at least 21 days apart.
Trial Feedback Questionnaire is optional and anonymized; responses will not be reviewed by investigators.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Implementation of Urgent Safety Measures (USM) regarding retinal vasculitis and retinal vascular occlusion.
Clarification on safety assessments and modifications due to COVID-19 pandemic.
